description: Determine the extent of the incident and identify affected systems, users, and data.
implementation_guidance: Review incident reports, interview users, and validate alerts. Avoid making containment changes until scope is understood.
risk_if_skipped: Incomplete response may leave affected assets unidentified.

description: Create an inventory of all systems impacted by the incident.
implementation_guidance: Use asset inventory records and incident reports to list affected endpoints, servers, or network components.

description: Prevent lateral movement by disconnecting the affected system from the network.
implementation_guidance: Disable network interfaces or physically disconnect cables. Do not power off the system.
risk_if_skipped: Threat may spread to other systems.

description: Disable accounts suspected of being compromised to prevent misuse.
implementation_guidance: Temporarily disable the account in IAM or directory services.

description: Delete malware files and associated artifacts from affected systems.
implementation_guidance: Use trusted antivirus or manual file removal after evidence collection.

action_name: Restore system from known good backup
description: Recover affected systems using verified clean backups.
implementation_guidance: Ensure backups predate the incident and verify integrity before restoring.

description: Analyze how the incident occurred to prevent recurrence.
implementation_guidance: Review logs, timelines, and system changes leading to the incident.
risk_if_skipped: Same attack vector may be reused.
